title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1800.2 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1800.2 - Purpose

State Regulations

There is a present need to provide to selected young inmates
a special six-month program of shock incarceration, stressing a highly
structured routine of discipline, intensive regimentation, exercise and work
therapy, together with substance abuse workshops, education, prerelease
counseling and self-improvement counseling. If an inmate successfully completes
the shock incarceration program, he or she will be eligible for parole release
and will be awarded a certificate of earned eligibility pursuant to Correction

Law, sections
805 and 807. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1800.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
